name: i18n-translation-manager
description: Universal automated translation management tool for i18n projects with dynamic language detection - works with Vue.js, React, Angular, Node.js, and any framework using JSON locale files

scripts.server: npm run build && node dist/cli.js server 3000
scripts.server:dev: npm run build && node --watch dist/cli.js server 3000
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build:prod && echo 'Publishing optimized i18n-translation-manager...'
scripts.release:patch: npm run clean && npm run build:prod && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run clean && npm run build:prod && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: npm run clean && npm run build:prod && npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.pipeline:build: npm run clean && npm run build:prod && npm pack --dry-run
scripts.publish:check: npm run clean && npm run build && npm publish --dry-run
scripts.ci:local: npm run pipeline:check && echo 'Local CI checks passed!'
scripts.release:help:
echo 'Release commands:
  npm run release:patch  - 2.0.0 → 2.0.1
  npm run release:minor  - 2.0.0 → 2.1.0
  npm run release:major  - 2.0.0 → 3.0.0
  npm run ci:local      - Run local CI checks
  npm run publish:check - Test publish without uploading'
